segments.text: Come here ! I can see the tall camphor trees from here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we can also see some yew trees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is a great botanical garden in the city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen to the sound of nature ! It's like music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I agree.It makes you feel really good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean the red flowers ? They are peony flowers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The red and yellow peony flowers are so beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you like them very much . right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'm going to take more pictures today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can help you with it
segments.speaker: S1
